text: {"grade": 0, "reasoning": "The criterion requires the answer to state that the GIP\u2019s constitutive convention determines whether its mission is classified as an industrial/commercial public service (SPIC) or an administrative public service (SPA). The candidate answer discusses the conditions for private law employment within a GIP but fails to mention the crucial role of the constitutive convention in classifying the GIP's mission (SPA vs. SPIC), which often dictates the applicable employment regime.", "criterion_id": "d63289f8-88cf-4039-a141-27fa9e6ae3c6"}
